column5: Gentlemen, years ago when my friend's son needed help on a school project, I offered to help - how hard could it be to find information on fish like peacock bass and redeye bass... Well, I found that there is a lot of information out there but it is scattered. I set out to build a site that had all the information in one spot from techniques to tips, from general information about the fish to details on knots, weights and lures.  So I spent the last three years building the site. However, I did it alone and would greatly appreciate any feedback you might have to offer. My goal this year is to spend more time fishing than writing about them
And he had such promise at 5:43 when he joined OFC. Roy....   Art
